info.title: Batch Master Record
info.description: This synchronous inbound API enables you to read, create and change batches. Additionally, it is possible to retrieve and to edit the related classification data. The service is based on the OData protocol, and can be consumed by external systems and user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Use this service to create, change and read batches with classification data

values.text: Batch Management - Batch OData Inbound Integration(SAP_COM_0337)
[Enablement of SAP Excise Tax Management(4LO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4LO " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Batch HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
